00018 #ifndef __TLM_INITIATOR_SOCKET_H__
00019 #define __TLM_INITIATOR_SOCKET_H__
00020 
00021 //#include <systemc>
00022 #include "tlm_h/tlm_annotated/tlm_fw_bw_ifs/tlm_fw_bw_ifs.h"
00023 
00024 namespace tlm {
00025 
00026 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH,
00027           typename FW_IF,
00028           typename BW_IF> class tlm_target_socket;
00029 
00030 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00031           typename FW_IF = tlm_fw_nb_transport_if<>,
00032           typename BW_IF = tlm_bw_nb_transport_if<> >
00033 class tlm_initiator_socket : public sc_core::sc_port<FW_IF>
00034 {
00035 public:
00036   typedef FW_IF                                 fw_interface_type;
00037   typedef BW_IF                                 bw_interface_type;
00038   typedef sc_core::sc_port<fw_interface_type>   port_type;
00039   typedef sc_core::sc_export<bw_interface_type> export_type;
00040   typedef tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00041                             fw_interface_type,
00042                             bw_interface_type>  target_socket_type;
00043 
00044   friend class tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00045                                  fw_interface_type,
00046                                  bw_interface_type>;
00047 
00048 public:
00049   tlm_initiator_socket(const char* name) :
00050     port_type(name)
00051   {
00052   }
00053 
00054   unsigned int get_bus_width() const
00055   {
00056     return BUSWIDTH;
00057   }
00058 
00059   //
00060   // Bind initiator socket to target socket
00061   // - Binds the port of the initiator socket to the export of the target
00062   //   socket
00063   // - Binds the port of the target socket to the export of the initiator
00064   //   socket
00065   //
00066   void bind(target_socket_type& s)
00067   {
00068     // initiator.port -> target.export
00069     (*static_cast<port_type*>(this))(*static_cast<typename target_socket_type::export_type*>(&s));
00070     // target.port -> initiator.export
00071     s.mPort(mExport);
00072   }
00073 
00074   void operator() (target_socket_type& s)
00075   {
00076     bind(s);
00077   }
00078 
00079   //
00080   // Bind initiator socket to initiator socket (hierarchical bind)
00081   // - Binds both the export and the port
00082   //
00083   void bind(tlm_initiator_socket& s)
00084   {
00085     // port
00086     (*static_cast<port_type*>(this))(*static_cast<port_type*>(&s));
00087     // export
00088     s.mExport(mExport);
00089   }
00090 
00091   void operator() (tlm_initiator_socket& s)
00092   {
00093     bind(s);
00094   }
00095 
00096   //
00097   // Bind interface to socket
00098   // - Binds the interface to the export of this socket
00099   //
00100   void bind(bw_interface_type& ifs)
00101   {
00102     mExport(ifs);
00103   }
00104 
00105   void operator() (bw_interface_type& s)
00106   {
00107     bind(s);
00108   }
00109 
00110 protected:
00111   export_type mExport;
00112 };
00113 
00114 } // namespace tlm
00115 
00116 #endif
